member.name: T:ExtendableEnums.SimpleOData.Client.ExtendableEnumConverter
member.summary: A static class that provides helper methods to allows the Simple OData client to serialize/deserialize ExtendableEnums.

member.summary: Registers type converter with the ODataSettings to be used with an ODataClient.
member.typeparam: The to be registered as an ExtenableEnum.
member.param: The with which to register the type converter.

member.name: M:ExtendableEnums.SimpleOData.Client.ExtendableEnumConverter.Convert(System.Type,System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Converts a dictionary with a value key to an ExtendableEnum of equivilent value.
member.param: The ExtendableEnum descendant type to convert to.
The dictionary containing the Value key to use to convert to an ExtenableEnum.
member.returns: A dynamic object which has an underlying type of the given the specied, set to the value found in the dictionary parameter passed in.
